extension.name: Robosane
extension.author: Ben Klein
extension.description: A strikingly simple and clean look, for the open-source lovers like me.

field.name: siteLogo
field.label: Site Logo
field.description: Logo to be used at the left of the navbar. Width is always 60px. Best fit: 1w:1.3h ratio.

field.name: headerBackground
field.label: Header Image
field.description: Picture to use as the header background, if there is a module in the header position.

field.name: footerImage
field.label: Footer Image
field.description: The Image to use as the footer for the page, if there are modules in the 'footer-image' position.

field.name: sitename
field.label: Site Display Name
field.description: The text to display in the navbar next to the Site Logo.

field.name: twittercards
field.label: Enable Twitter Cards
field.description: Choose to enable the addition of the twitter cards meta tags on each page.

field.name: twitter_sitename
field.label: Twitter site name
field.description: The @username to associate this card with for analytics. (include the @)

field.name: twitter_default-title
field.label: Default Twitter Title
field.description: The Title of the article to show when one can't be loaded, or is the front page.

field.name: twitter_default-desc
field.label: Default Twitter Description
field.description: The Description for Twitter to access when we're not on an article page or are on the homepage

field.name: twitter_default-img
field.label: Default Twitter Image
field.description: The image to display as a thumbnail for summary cards.
